description: Esther Before Ahasuerus (recto);  Slight Sketch of an Ornamental Vase (verso); Frans Crabbe van Espleghem (Flemish, about 1480 - 1552); 1525; Pen and dark brown ink, with touches of gray-brown wash, over black chalk, incised for transfer (recto); black chalk (verso); 23.7 × 19.4 cm (9 5/16 × 7 5/8 in.); 90.GA.4; J.
